def minimum_tape_length(n, m, k, broken_segments):
    gaps = [broken_segments[i + 1] - broken_segments[i] - 1 for i in range(n - 1)]
    gaps.sort()
    if k != n:
        return n
    min_total_length = sum(gaps[:n - k]) + n
    return min_total_length

def minimum_tape_length(n, m, k, broken_segments):
